General.Name: EL. D. Mouzakis S.A
General.Description: EL. D. Mouzakis S.A. produces and sells textile products in Greece and internationally. The company offers cotton, polyester, poly-cotton, fur, and poly- poly sewing threads; and machine embroidery threads, as well as cotton and imported hand knitting yarns, yarns for crochet, sewing threads, printed canvases, embroidery kits, printed designs, metallic embroidery threads, and other accessories. It offers its products under the DMC brand name. EL. D. Mouzakis S.A. was founded in 1944 and is headquartered in Athens, Greece.
